name: FL4IR COUNTRY 82-92
description:
FL4IR COUNTRY '82-92

Find the dojo. Don't die. Collect every payday. Check EVERYwhere for helpful items and upgrades. Use Gigs wisely. 

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Jump - C
  • Fight - X
  • Climb/Collect Items - Up
  • Woooooh! - X + Down

WATCH THE TRAILER
